replies.bodyText:
➜  alluxio git:(azure_gen2) ./bin/alluxio fs mount 
--option fs.azure.account.key.bradleytest1.dfs.core.windows.net=<SHARED_KEY> 
/abfs abfss://container@bradleytest1.dfs.core.windows.net/
Mounted abfss://container@bradleytest1.dfs.core.windows.net/ at /abfs
